channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Waymo experimenting with generative AI, but exec says LiDAR and radar sensors important to self-driving safety ‘under all conditions’
item.description: Waymo is experimenting with generative AI, but its current approach is a stark contrast to one of its newer rivals, Tesla.

item.title: Trump says ‘we didn’t get there’ but touts progress as meeting with Putin ends without a deal to stop Ukraine war
item.description: "We had an extremely productive meeting, and many points were agreed to and there are just a very few that are left."

item.title: Intel’s stock has best week in 25 years. But would Trump’s aid just be a waste?
Trump hints at higher semiconductor tariffs. How companies could dodge them.
Why the Trump-Putin summit is no ‘magic lever’ to unleash global oil supplies
DC’s attorney general says Trump’s police takeover is illegal and will ‘wreak operational havoc’ in the capital
item.description: U.S. Attorney General Pam Bondi said DEA boss Terry Cole will assume the police chief's duties and approval authority for any orders issued to officer...

item.title: ‘Godfather of AI’ says tech companies aren’t concerned with the AI endgame. They’re focused on short-term profits instead

item.title: Trump’s Social Security tax cuts could hit future generations hard and propel the program’s insolvency by 2032, research warns
item.description: Cutting federal taxes on Social Security benefits gives immediate relief to retirees—but experts warn it could trigger benefit cuts for future generat...

item.title: Half of Gen Z spends $0 a month on dating thanks to a ‘romance recession’
Opendoor bulls are getting what they want, and the stock is surging again
